knimeNode.name: Deploy R Model to MSSQL
knimeNode.shortDescription: Run R code in a SQL query using a pre-trained R Model on an Microsoft SQL Server directly in database.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows running R code on a Microsoft SQL Server. Input and output data to the R script are SQL tables. In addition the knime.model variable from a R port can be used in the R script.

tab.name: R Editor
